parameters.name: X-Pubkey
parameters.description: Integrator's ECDSA public key (P-256 curve, compressed SEC1 format). Example: 0x038fedef7c12f93bbf342ad8943b7a825a3b41f61c9dc118b2c718efebabbf62fd

parameters.name: X-Timestamp
parameters.description: Unix timestamp in seconds (UTC). Must be within tolerance window (1 minute) to prevent replay attacks. Example: 1760375826

parameters.name: X-Signature
parameters.description: ECDSA signature (DER-encoded, hex with 0x prefix). Signs the message: {timestamp}{METHOD}{path_and_query}{json_body}. Example: 0x3045022100...

parameters.description: ECDSA signature (DER-encoded, hex with 0x prefix). Signs the message: {timestamp}{METHOD}{path_and_query}{json_body}. Example: 0x3045022100...

log_index.description: Log index of the deposit event

on_behalf.description: Address on behalf of whom the deposit was made

shares.description: Amount of shares received for the deposit

user_id.description: User ID associated with this deposit

vault_id.description: Vault ID associated with this deposit

currentBalanceShares.description: Current balance in shares after this transaction

limit.description: Limit number of transactions per vault

vaults.description: List of vault positions for this user

lastUpdateTimestamp.description: Timestamp of the last update in milliseconds

lastUpdateTxHash.description: Hash of the last update transaction

ratio.description: Share to asset ratio (last share price)

transactions.description: List of transactions for this vault

log_index.description: Log index of the withdrawal event

receiver.description: Address that received the withdrawn assets

shares.description: Amount of shares burned for the withdrawal

user_id.description: User ID associated with this withdrawal

vault_id.description: Vault ID associated with this withdrawal
